sections.heading: Water Officer; survey of streams
sections.text: The Chief Water Officer may make surveys of streams showing location of possible water power developments and irrigation projects.SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. VII, art. V, div. 2, § 30, p. 845;C.S.1922, § 8449;C.S.1929, § 81-6330;R.S.1943, § 46-212;Laws 1984, LB 897

61-208.Chief Water Officer; survey of streams.

The Chief Water Officer may make surveys of streams showing location of possible water power developments and irrigation projects.

SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. VII, art. V, div. 2, § 30, p. 845;C.S.1922, § 8449;C.S.1929, § 81-6330;R.S.1943, § 46-212;Laws 1984, LB 897, § 4;R.S.1943, (1998), § 46-212;Laws 2000, LB 900, § 8;Laws 2025, LB317, § 334.Operative Date: July 1, 2025
